data.name: AddAppFullName
data.value: Add one or more projects to a solution file.

data.name: AddProjectPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The paths to the projects to add to the solution.

data.name: AddProjectPathArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: AddProjectSolutionFolderArgumentDescription
data.value: The destination solution folder path to add the projects to.

data.name: BuildAppFullName
data.value: .NET Builder

data.name: BuildConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to use for building the project. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

data.name: BuildFrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to build for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.

data.name: BuildOutputOptionDescription
data.value: The output directory to place built artifacts in.

data.name: BuildRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to build for.

data.name: BuildServerCommandDescription
data.value: Interact with servers started from a build.

data.name: BuildServerShutdownCommandDescription
data.value: Shuts down build servers that are started from dotnet. By default, all servers are shut down.

data.name: CannotCombineOptions
data.value: Cannot use the {0} and {1} options together.

data.name: CleanAppFullName
data.value: .NET Clean Command

data.name: CleanCmdOutputDir
data.value: OUTPUT_DIR

data.name: CleanCmdOutputDirDescription
data.value: The directory containing the build artifacts to clean.

data.name: CleanConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to clean for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

data.name: CleanFrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to clean for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.

data.name: CleanRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to clean for.

data.name: CleanFileBasedAppArtifactsCommandDescription
data.value: Removes artifacts created for file-based apps

data.name: CleanFileBasedAppArtifactsDryRun
data.value: Determines changes without actually modifying the file system

data.name: CleanFileBasedAppArtifactsDays
data.value: How many days an artifact folder needs to be unused in order to be removed

data.name: CmdConfig
data.value: CONFIG_FILE

data.name: CmdConfigDescription
data.value: The path to the NuGet config file to use. Requires the '--outdated', '--deprecated' or '--vulnerable' option.

data.name: CmdConfigFileOption
data.value: FILE

data.name: CmdConfigFileOptionDescription
data.value: The NuGet configuration file to use.

data.name: CmdCurrentRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: Use current runtime as the target runtime.

data.name: CmdDeprecatedDescription
data.value: Lists packages that have been deprecated. Cannot be combined with '--vulnerable' or '--outdated' options.

data.name: CmdDisableParallelOptionDescription
data.value: Prevent restoring multiple projects in parallel.

data.name: CmdFileDescription
data.value: Path to the file-based program.

data.name: CmdOptionForceDescription
data.value: Force conversion even if there are malformed directives.

data.name: CmdForceRestoreOptionDescription
data.value: Force all dependencies to be resolved even if the last restore was successful. This is equivalent to deleting project.assets.json.

data.name: CmdFormatDescription
data.value: Specifies the output format type for the list packages command.

data.name: CmdHighestMinorDescription
data.value: Consider only the packages with a matching major version number when searching for newer packages. Requires the '--outdated' option.

data.name: CmdHighestPatchDescription
data.value: Consider only the packages with a matching major and minor version numbers when searching for newer packages. Requires the '--outdated' option.

data.name: CmdIgnoreFailedSourcesOptionDescription
data.value: Treat package source failures as warnings.

data.name: CmdIncludeSourceDescription
data.value: Include PDBs and source files. Source files go into the 'src' folder in the resulting nuget package.

data.name: CmdIncludeSymbolsDescription
data.value: Include packages with symbols in addition to regular packages in output directory.

data.name: CmdLockedModeOptionDescription
data.value: Don't allow updating project lock file.

data.name: CmdLockFilePathOption
data.value: LOCK_FILE_PATH

data.name: CmdLockFilePathOptionDescription
data.value: Output location where project lock file is written. By default, this is 'PROJECT_ROOT\packages.lock.json'.

data.name: CmdNoBuildOptionDescription
data.value: Do not build the project before packing. Implies --no-restore.

data.name: CmdNoDependenciesOptionDescription
data.value: Do not restore project-to-project references and only restore the specified project.

data.name: CmdNoHttpCacheOptionDescription
data.value: Disable Http Caching for packages.

data.name: CmdOutdatedDescription
data.value: Lists packages that have newer versions. Cannot be combined with '--deprecated' or '--vulnerable' options.

data.name: CmdOutputVersionDescription
data.value: Specifies the version of machine-readable output. Requires the '--format json' option.

data.name: CmdNoRestoreDescription
data.value: Do not restore before running the command.

data.name: CmdPackage
data.value: PACKAGE_NAME

data.name: CmdPackageDirectory
data.value: PACKAGE_DIR

data.name: CmdPackageDirectoryDescription
data.value: The directory to restore packages to.

data.name: CmdPackagesOption
data.value: PACKAGES_DIR

data.name: CmdPackagesOptionDescription
data.value: The directory to restore packages to.

data.name: CmdPrereleaseDescription
data.value: Consider packages with prerelease versions when searching for newer packages. Requires the '--outdated' option.

data.name: CmdProjectDescriptionFormat
data.value: Defines the path of the project file to run. Use path to the project file, or path to the directory containing the project file. If not specified, it defaults to the current directory.

data.name: CmdReevaluateOptionDescription
data.value: Forces restore to reevaluate all dependencies even if a lock file already exists.

data.name: CmdRuntimeOption
data.value: RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER

data.name: CmdRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to restore packages for.

data.name: CmdServiceableDescription
data.value: Set the serviceable flag in the package. See https://aka.ms/nupkgservicing for more information.

data.name: CmdSourceOption
data.value: SOURCE

data.name: CmdSourceOptionDescription
data.value: The NuGet package source to use for the restore.

data.name: CmdTransitiveDescription
data.value: Lists transitive and top-level packages.

data.name: CmdUnsupportedTestRunnerDescription
data.value: Test runner '{0}' is not supported.

data.name: CmdUseLockFileOptionDescription
data.value: Enables project lock file to be generated and used with restore.

data.name: CmdVersion
data.value: VERSION

data.name: CmdVersionDescription
data.value: The version of the package to add.

data.name: CmdVulnerableDescription
data.value: Lists packages that have known vulnerabilities. Cannot be combined with '--deprecated' or '--outdated' options.

data.name: CommandArgumentDescription
data.value: The SDK command to launch online help for.

data.name: CommandArgumentName
data.value: COMMAND_NAME

data.name: CommandOptionLaunchProfileDescription
data.value: The name of the launch profile (if any) to use when launching the application.

data.name: CommandOptionLaunchProfileHelpName
data.value: LAUNCH_PROFILE

data.name: CommandOptionNoBuildDescription
data.value: Do not build the project before running. Implies --no-restore.

data.name: CommandOptionNoCacheDescription
data.value: Skip up to date checks and always build the program before running.

data.name: CommandOptionNoLaunchProfileArgumentsDescription
data.value: Do not use arguments specified in launch profile to run the application.

data.name: CommandOptionNoLaunchProfileDescription
data.value: Do not attempt to use launchSettings.json or [app].run.json to configure the application.

data.name: CommandOptionProjectHelpName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: CommandOptionFileDescription
data.value: The path to the file-based app to run (can be also passed as the first argument if there is no project in the current directory).

data.name: CommandOptionFileHelpName
data.value: FILE_PATH

data.name: ConfigFileArgumentName
data.value: ConfigFile

data.name: ConfigFileDescription
data.value: The NuGet configuration file. If specified, only the settings from this file will be used. If not specified, the hierarchy of configuration files from the current directory will be used. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/nuget/consume-packages/configuring-nuget-behavior

data.name: CurrentRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: Use current runtime as the target runtime.

data.name: DotnetTestCommandMTPDescription
data.value: .NET Test Command for Microsoft.Testing.Platform (opted-in via 'global.json' file). This only supports Microsoft.Testing.Platform and doesn't support VSTest. For more information, see https://aka.ms/dotnet-test.

data.name: ExactMatchDescription
data.value: Require that the search term exactly match the name of the package. Causes `--take` and `--skip` options to be ignored.

data.name: FormatArgumentName
data.value: Format

data.name: FormatDescription
data.value: Format the output accordingly. Either `table`, or `json`. The default value is `table`.

data.name: FrameworkVersionOption
data.value: FRAMEWORK_VERSION

data.name: FrameworkVersionOptionDescription
data.value: The Microsoft.NETCore.App package version that will be used to run the assemblies.

data.name: HelpAppFullName
data.value: .NET CLI help utility

data.name: InRoot
data.value: Place project in root of the solution, rather than creating a solution folder.

data.name: IntermediateWorkingDirOption
data.value: WORKING_DIR

data.name: IntermediateWorkingDirOptionDescription
data.value: The working directory used by the command to execute.

data.name: ListAppFullName
data.value: List all projects in a solution file.

data.name: ListSolutionFoldersArgumentDescription
data.value: Display solution folder paths.

data.name: ManifestOption
data.value: MANIFEST

data.name: ManifestOptionDescription
data.value: The path to a target manifest file that contains the list of packages to be excluded from the publish step.

data.name: MigrateAppFullName
data.value: Generate a .slnx file from a .sln file.

data.name: MSBuildOptionDescription
data.value: Shut down the MSBuild build server.

data.name: NetAddCommand
data.value: .NET Add Command

data.name: NetListCommand
data.value: List references or packages of a .NET project.

data.name: NetRemoveCommand
data.value: .NET Remove Command

data.name: NoBuildOptionDescription
data.value: Do not build the project before publishing. Implies --no-restore.

data.name: NoDependenciesOptionDescription
data.value: Do not build project-to-project references and only build the specified project.

data.name: NoIncrementalOptionDescription
data.value: Do not use incremental building.

data.name: OutputOptionName
data.value: OUTPUT_DIR

data.name: PackageAddAppFullName
data.value: Add a NuGet package reference to the project.

data.name: PackageAddCmdFramework
data.value: FRAMEWORK

data.name: PackageAddCmdFrameworkDescription
data.value: Add the reference only when targeting a specific framework.

data.name: PackageAddCmdNoRestoreDescription
data.value: Add the reference without performing restore preview and compatibility check.

data.name: PackageAddCmdSource
data.value: SOURCE

data.name: PackageAddCmdSourceDescription
data.value: The NuGet package source to use during the restore.

data.name: PackageListAppFullName
data.value: List all package references of the project or solution.

data.name: PackageListCmdFramework
data.value: FRAMEWORK | FRAMEWORK\RID

data.name: PackageListCmdFrameworkDescription
data.value: Chooses a framework to show its packages. Use the option multiple times for multiple frameworks.

data.name: PackageListCmdSource
data.value: SOURCE

data.name: PackageListCmdSourceDescription
data.value: The NuGet sources to use when searching for newer packages. Requires the '--outdated', '--deprecated' or '--vulnerable' option.

data.name: PackageRemoveAppFullName
data.value: Remove a NuGet package reference from the project.

data.name: PackageRemoveAppHelpText
data.value: The package reference to remove.

data.name: PackageSearchCommandDescription
data.value: Searches one or more package sources for packages that match a search term. If no sources are specified, all sources defined in the NuGet.Config are used.

data.name: PackageSearchPrereleaseDescription
data.value: Include prerelease packages.

data.name: PackageSearchSearchTermArgumentName
data.value: SearchTerm

data.name: PackageSearchSearchTermDescription
data.value: Search term to filter package names, descriptions, and tags. Used as a literal value. Example: `dotnet package search some.package`. See also `--exact-match`.

data.name: PackageSearchSkipArgumentName
data.value: Skip

data.name: PackageSearchSkipDescription
data.value: Number of results to skip, to allow pagination. Default 0.

data.name: PackageSearchTakeArgumentName
data.value: Take

data.name: PackageSearchTakeDescription
data.value: Number of results to return. Default 20.

data.name: PackAppFullName
data.value: .NET Core NuGet Package Packer

data.name: PackCmdOutputDir
data.value: OUTPUT_DIR

data.name: PackCmdOutputDirDescription
data.value: The output directory to place built packages in.

data.name: PackConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to use for building the package. The default is 'Release'.

data.name: ProjectConvertAppFullName
data.value: Convert a file-based program to a project-based program.

data.name: ProjectConvertDryRun
data.value: Determines changes without actually modifying the file system

data.name: ProjectManifest
data.value: PROJECT_MANIFEST

data.name: ProjectManifestDescription
data.value: The XML file that contains the list of packages to be stored.

data.name: PublishAppDescription
data.value: Publisher for the .NET Platform

data.name: PublishConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to publish for. The default is 'Release' for NET 8.0 projects and above, but 'Debug' for older projects.

data.name: PublishFrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to publish for. The target framework has to be specified in the project file.

data.name: PublishOutputOption
data.value: OUTPUT_DIR

data.name: PublishOutputOptionDescription
data.value: The output directory to place the published artifacts in.

data.name: PublishRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to publish for. This is used when creating a self-contained deployment. The default is to publish a framework-dependent application.

data.name: RazorOptionDescription
data.value: Shut down the Razor build server.

data.name: ReferenceAddAppFullName
data.value: Add a project-to-project reference to the project.

data.name: ReferenceAddCmdFrameworkDescription
data.value: Add the reference only when targeting a specific framework.

data.name: ReferenceAddProjectPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The paths to the projects to add as references.

data.name: ReferenceAddProjectPathArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: ReferenceListAppFullName
data.value: List all project-to-project references of the project.

data.name: ReferenceRemoveAppFullName
data.value: Remove a project-to-project reference from the project.

data.name: ReferenceRemoveCmdFrameworkDescription
data.value: Remove the reference only when targeting a specific framework.

data.name: ReferenceRemoveProjectPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The paths to the referenced projects to remove.

data.name: ReferenceRemoveProjectPathArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: RemoveAppFullName
data.value: Remove one or more projects from a solution file.

data.name: RemoveProjectPathArgumentDescription
data.value: The project paths or names to remove from the solution.

data.name: RemoveProjectPathArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT_PATH

data.name: RestoreAppFullName
data.value: .NET dependency restorer

data.name: RunAppFullName
data.value: .NET Run Command

data.name: RunConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to run for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

data.name: RunFrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to run for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.

data.name: RunRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to run for.

data.name: SdkAppFullName
data.value: .NET SDK Command

data.name: SdkCheckAppFullName
data.value: .NET SDK Check Command

data.name: SkipOptimizationOptionDescription
data.value: Skip the optimization phase.

data.name: SkipSymbolsOptionDescription
data.value: Skip creating symbol files which can be used for profiling the optimized assemblies.

data.name: SolutionAppFullName
data.value: .NET modify solution file command

data.name: SolutionArgumentDescription
data.value: The solution file to operate on. If not specified, the command will search the current directory for one.

data.name: SolutionArgumentName
data.value: SLN_FILE

data.name: SourceArgumentName
data.value: Source

data.name: SourceDescription
data.value: The package source to search. You can pass multiple `--source` options to search multiple package sources. Example: `--source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json`.

data.name: StoreAppDescription
data.value: Stores the specified assemblies for the .NET Platform. By default, these will be optimized for the target runtime and framework.

data.name: StoreFrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to store packages for. The target framework has to be specified in the project file.

data.name: StoreOutputOption
data.value: OUTPUT_DIR

data.name: StoreOutputOptionDescription
data.value: The output directory to store the given assemblies in.

data.name: StoreRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to store packages for.

data.name: DotnetTestCommandVSTestDescription
data.value: .NET Test Command for VSTest. To use Microsoft.Testing.Platform, opt-in to the Microsoft.Testing.Platform-based command via global.json. For more information, see https://aka.ms/dotnet-test.

data.name: TestConfigurationOptionDescription
data.value: The configuration to use for running tests. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

data.name: TestFrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to run tests for. The target framework must also be specified in the project file.

data.name: TestRuntimeOptionDescription
data.value: The target runtime to test for.

data.name: ValidationFailedDuplicateVersion
data.value: Cannot specify --version when the package argument already contains a version.

data.name: VBCSCompilerOptionDescription
data.value: Shut down the VB/C# compiler build server.

data.name: VerbosityArgumentName
data.value: Verbosity

data.name: VerbosityDescription
data.value: Display this amount of details in the output: `normal`, `minimal`, `detailed`. The default is `normal`

data.name: SolutionAddReferencedProjectsOptionDescription
data.value: Recursively add projects' ReferencedProjects to solution

data.name: ToolExecuteCommandDescription
data.value: Executes a tool from source without permanently installing it.

data.name: PackCmdVersionDescription
data.value: The version of the package to create

data.name: PackCmdVersion
data.value: VERSION

data.name: ProjectOrFileArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT | FILE

data.name: ProjectArgumentDescription
data.value: The project file to operate on. If a file is not specified, the command will search the current directory for one.

data.name: ProjectOrFileArgumentDescription
data.value: The project file or C# file-based app to operate on. If a file is not specified, the command will search the current directory for a project file.

data.name: FileArgumentDescription
data.value: The file-based app to operate on.

data.name: CommonCmdFramework
data.value: FRAMEWORK

data.name: VerbosityOptionDescription
data.value: Set the MSBuild verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic].

data.name: LevelArgumentName
data.value: LEVEL

data.name: SolutionOrProjectArgumentDescription
data.value: The project or solution file to operate on. If a file is not specified, the command will search the current directory for one.

data.name: SolutionOrProjectOrFileArgumentDescription
data.value: The project or solution or C# (file-based program) file to operate on. If a file is not specified, the command will search the current directory for a project or solution.

data.name: SolutionOrProjectOrFileArgumentName
data.value: PROJECT | SOLUTION | FILE

data.name: CommandPrereleaseOptionDescription
data.value: Allows prerelease packages to be installed.

data.name: InvalidVersion
data.value: Invalid version string: {0}

data.name: YesOptionDescription
data.value: Accept all confirmation prompts using "yes."
